skills: Can be used in all temperature areas of a boiler. Can be used with no steam available or a shortage of steam. Doesn't cause erosion.
Fully automatic and safe operation. Low pressure installation.
Ability to produce steam with as little energy waste as possible. Smart design  that take up less space for installation, and less noisier to operate.
Combination boiler which works your indoor central heating system and hot water in one whole unit without the need for a cylinder to store hot water.
